features: Features 6 US army men and 6 Special Forces combat soldiers action figures. Each army guys model is about 3.75" tall.
They have excellent quality and can perform various actions like sitting, standing, turning their heads, moving their arms, and legs, making them perfect for action-packed play sessions.
Unique Weapons included with each soldier, There are 12 guns in total. In addition, each action figures has a distinctly defined look that reflects the character's position in the army.
Not only do these army men action figures work great as standalone toys, but they also great for seting them up with military vehicles in all kinds of battle scenes. Loads of fun!
Whether you're a collector of military memorabilia or a kid who loves to play with soldier toys, this army toys will provide hours of entertainment and fun.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Perfect Choice of Military Action Figures Are you looking for the ultimate army men action figures set for your kids or as a gift for toy collectors? Look no further! Our army men set includes 12 highly detailed and independent action figures. The set includes 6 US soldiers and 6 special forces combat soldiers, allowing you to set up realistic battle scenes.

High Quality Army Men Set for Your Little One These army men toys are designed with excellent quality and very good details, ensuring vivid expression and realistic movements. They can bend, sit, stand, turn their heads, and move their arms and legs, providing a wide range of realistic poses and movements. Plus, with their unique weapons included, each soldier toy has a distinctly defined look and reflects that character's position within the military.

A perfect fit for military vehicles Not only do these army figures work great as standalone toys, but they also fit perfectly with most military vehicles. The soldiers can be placed in vehicles to add an extra layer of realism to your military battle scenes. Right size Measuring about 4 inches each, these soldier action figures are the perfect size for little hands to play around with. They are easy to maneuver and pose. Premium quality Made from high-quality environmental plastic material, ensuring safety for children while they play. They are built to last and withstand the wear and tear of imaginative play.

Great Army Toys Gift In conclusion, our army men action figures set is perfect for toy collectors, military enthusiasts, and children who love imaginative play. With their excellent quality, attention to detail, and realistic movements, they provide a highly immersive play experience. Order today and get ready to create your own epic army battles!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids Loved These
reviews.reviewText: These are really nicely made and go along great with the miniature zombie figurines. I gifted these to my friends kids whom went nuts over them. Happy with my purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SWAT team toy soldiers
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought these for my nephew who became a marine to put on top of his cake!. They worked great and after the party all the young kids loved playing with them. They seem very sturdy and well made. They held up well to lots of kids playing with them and I let them all take one home! Reasonable price for the set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy solider pack
reviews.reviewText: I was so happy to stumble across this pack of soldiers. The quality is great and the soldiers came with accessories. I was very pleased with how many came in the pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: these break easily, my husband has had a great time coming up with creative ways to replace or put back the body parts that are no longer with us. i would say 80% of the men have had a casualty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mobile and great size
reviews.reviewText: These are great and my son loves them. The arms and legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very detailed guns and that could be good or bad!
reviews.reviewText: These 3" US Army Men and SWAT Team Toy Soldiers Playset is outstanding in its detail and quality. Each figure is meticulously crafted, with strikingly realistic features and weapons that showcase impressive attention to detail. While this realism might raise concerns for some parents due to the very lifelike appearance of the weapons, it's a testament to the set's authenticity. These figures are remarkably sturdy, holding up well even with disproportionate weight distribution, a feature that enhances their play value. Their ability to stand upright without toppling over is a notable attribute, making this playset a five-star choice for kids who love action-packed, imaginative play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great toys but don’t hold up long.
reviews.reviewText: My boys love these but they come apart and break after a few months of play. If you have older kids that are more gentle they would be fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these for my grandsons who are 4 YOA. The absolutely loved them.
